title: APhA - For Every Pharmacist. For All of Pharmacy.
description: APhA is the largest association of pharmacists in the United States and is the only organization advancing the entire pharmacy profession.
cleaned_text: In the past month, the profession of pharmacy has lost two very prominent leaders; Thomas Temple, longtime executive director of the Iowa Pharmacists Association; and Dominique Jordan, president of the International Pharmaceutical Federation (FIP) and former president of the Swiss Pharmacists Association (pharmaSuisse). I had the good fortune to know both of these gentlemen and I learned lessons from them that I thought would be worth passing on to those who read this blog. This is a tribute to both of their legacies.
